title: IT developer internship
description: Creation of tools to help the laboratory's researchers. Development of an Electron.js interface to simplify the scrapping of scientific article abstracts from multiple sources. Used Keras, Tensorflow and Scikit-Learn to train an AI model for accurate classification of articles and propose potential solutions using TRIZ methodology.

title: IT developer internship
description: Maintenance and enhancement of a web and mobile application, applying Agile and SCRUM methodologies. Use of Angular.ts for the frontend, Spring (Java EE) for the backend, and Ionic for the mobile application. Creation of an API using Nest.js and Puppeteer.

title: IT developer internship
description:
Contributed to the creation of a high-performance remote desktop application (AnyDesk), utilizing C++, Win32, SDL2, and DirectX. The company prioritized optimizing and developing in-house code with minimal external libraries.
  • Pioneered the design and development of an application to analyze logs from AnyDesk, enabling remote loading of log files to streamline debugging for developers.
  • Built low-level graphical components using the company's proprietary library, and conducted rigorous testing and debugging of internal IPC and graphic libraries.

title: Analyst Developer
description:
Leading analyst developer role utilizing Agile and SCRUM methodologies. Engineering desktop and mobile applications, websites, and APIs leveraging Microsoft technologies (C#, WPF, ASP).
  • Architecting and implementing a business application for PDF file processing and postal sorting, streamlining and automating processes by consolidating different software and services into a unified interface.
  • Executing upgrades, maintenance, and enhancements of existing applications using diverse technologies, analyzing business and user requirements, and seamlessly integrating functionalities into established systems.
  • Constructing libraries to standardize and simplify project development, conducting research and testing cutting-edge technologies to drive innovation.
